mainText.attr1: The goal of this section is to ease some of the challenges of Void Destroyer's story mode - in a non spoiler way.
Problem - creating challenging game play. Too hard or too easy.
Different players like different things, come with their own gaming histories, backgrounds and expectations.
If missions are too easy then you might lose interest, if the missions are too hard then you'll lose interest and be frustrated. I don't want either of those outcomes.
I spent a lot of time on the story portion of the game - with the goal of making it a memorable experience.
I know (nearly) everything that is going to happen - its hard for me to estimate your difficulty.
The topics in this section are added based on my estimations - based on player feedback. Feel free to contact me with any issues and I might add/revise this topic list for other players.
